description: Nestled amid a charming landscape of olive groves, this restaurant is not particularly easy to find, so make sure that you use a satnav or ask for directions when booking. A simple, minimalist-style dining room provides the backdrop for imaginative cuisine which includes plenty of vegetables and is full of contrasting flavours and reinterpreted regional influences.
facilitiesServices: ['Air conditioning', 'Car park', 'Garden or park', 'Restaurant offering vegetarian menus', 'Terrace', 'Wheelchair access']
